Content.Text:
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mmm, <MYNAME>. 'Morning. I'm so hungry in
the morning.
<PAGE>
When I'm hungry I don't feel much like
working.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Morning, <MYNAME>. You're so thin!
<PAGE>
Everyone tells me to exercise and get
thin... Can you teach me some exercises
that work?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Morning, <MYNAME>. You can get lots of
yummy things here it town. It means you
can eat well even when cooking at home!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Is it almost time to eat?
<PAGE>
I can sorta tell the time by the how
hungry I am. Pretty useful, huh?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Your farm seems to have
lots of yummy things!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Just thinking about it... makes me
hungry!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. I'm thinking about what to cook
for dinner. Maybe I'll cook something
Dad likes.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, <MYNAME>. Good evening.
<PAGE>
What'll I have for breakfast tomorrow?
We eat a lot, so it takes a lot of
preparation.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Is it true that if
you go to sleep right after eating
you'll turn into a cow?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>If it is, I think my dad and I are in
serious danger of turning into cows!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>The guests at our inn tell me that my
cooking tastes good.
<PAGE>
It makes me happy to hear that.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. It's so nice when it's
warm, isn't it!
it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>When it's this warm I get hungry really
quickly.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>... all my precious candy spoiled
because of the rain.
<PAGE>
It tasted so good, too! *Sigh*

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. It must be hot on the farm
at this time of year!
<PAGE>
You don't have a roof, after all. I
guess the animals must get hot too.
<PAGE>
If I were one of them, I'd be so totally
listless!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Is something wrong?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>It's raining so hard today. I guess
that's why we don't have many guests
today...

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's gotten cool lately, hasn't
it, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>This is the perfect temperature for me.
You don't sweat too much while working
and any food tastes great!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What terrible rain, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Dad can't concentrate on his novel
because of the noise of the rain. It's
tough to be around him!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look cold, <MYNAME>. Me? I'm not cold
at all.
<PAGE>
Hmm, maybe it's because I'm fat. I'm
okay with the cold.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Did you see the snow, <MYNAME>? It's
really snowing hard.
<PAGE>
I think pouring juice on snow would
make a tasty dessert. I'll have to try
that! Like, now!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, I'm glad you made it here. The
wind is so strong I'm surprised things
aren't flying away!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The snow outside is terrible, <MYNAME>.
I can't even see outside the window.
<PAGE>
After this much snow we'll be able to
make slides and snow houses. I hope the
snow stops quickly!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Say, say, <MYNAME>. I hear you found
someone special. Congratulations! ♪
<PAGE>
I'm being you all the way! Just tell me
if I can help with anything!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmmm... ingredients, ingredients. There
are lots of things in the forest. I come
here a lot to collect ingredients.
<PAGE>
Some for the guests and some for Dad and
myself. Although I pick more for us than
the guests.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A few days ago a bear appeared before me
and we had a sumo match. Huh? Who won?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I won. Everyone I tell that to says it's
amazing, but what's the big deal?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
There are lots of yummy fish in the
river. Ohh... I'm getting hungry. Maybe
I'll cook fish for tonight's dinner.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Once in a while, if I get really hungry
out here, I eat some mushrooms or edible
grass.
<PAGE>
I know by sight and experience which
ones taste good. You can do it too,
once you learn, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everyone who comes here says the air is
delicious, but what does that mean? It's
not like the air has any taste.
<PAGE>
Maybe it's the way I'm breathing it? I
don't know the proper way, if that's the
case. Can you tell me?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mom sends us yummy things on her trips,
but maybe this time I'll send her
something.
<PAGE>
I think Mom will enjoy sampling the rich
bounty of this mountain.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I always smell such good things growing
on your farm, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>This stuff must all taste so good! Boy,
I'm drooling.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dad says he wants to research your farm.
He's going to write a new novel. <MYNAME>,
can you help him out?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The dishes we serve on at the inn
contain ore taken from the mine here,
so my dad says.
<PAGE>
Hearing that makes me feel more affinity
for this place.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I tend to get hungry when I'm in a dark
place. My stomach's been growling for a
while now.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's sorta lonely in this town. I wish
more people would come. I get hungry
when I'm lonely.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The inn is starting to get more guests.
<PAGE>
The town has gotten livelier too. It's
sorta fun.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The town has gotten so lively. Our inn
is busy too.
<PAGE>
But Dad doesn't have time to work on his
novels anymore. He isn't taking that
side of things so well.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like this town. It's lively and clean,
there are forests and rivers, and the
food tastes great...
<PAGE>
There's no other town quite like it,
I'll bet. Dad says so too.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The town we used to live in didn't have
many food ingredients. It really made me
miss this town.
<PAGE>
I'm glad we got to come back. Dad said
so too.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I may not look it, but I'm a good cook.
Well, I have to cook since Dad can't.
<PAGE>
After Mom went traveling I was left in
the kitchen. Now, even the guests
compliment my cooking.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
We have guests who come to the inn just
for my cooking. They're my fans!
<PAGE>
They are just another reason that I have
to do my very best in the kitchen!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My mom used to live with us, but she
said she wanted to see the world, so
she went off and left Dad and me.
<PAGE>
Mom sends yummy things from abroad each
month, but we don't know when she's
coming back.
<PAGE>
Mom said she isn't coming home until
she travels around the world. I wonder
where she is right now...

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I think my dad is great.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>When I make a mistake or something
happens, he tells me it's okay.
<PAGE>
So I feel like if I stick with Dad,
things will always work out. Please,
don't tell him! It's embarrassing!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've always been told I'm so laid back.
Do you agree?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Still, I'm not as laid back as Dad! You
agree with that too, right <MYNAME>?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, come and stay at the inn some
time.
<PAGE>
You can stay using the employee's
discount, <MYNAME>. I want you to taste my
cooking.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, it's a cream puff! My favorite! I'd
like to make them, but it's not easy.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, is this for me? Thanks! I'll 
savor each bite.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Really? Thank you, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
Hmmm...I'm going to show Dad. He'll be
so jealous.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
How did you know that I liked this? You
are amazing, <MYNAME>. Thank you.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Huh? Not sure about this... I wonder if
our guests will enjoy it...?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Wow! What? D-Don't let it get close to
me... Stop or I'll get mad!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Mmmm... Mom made me simmered eggplant
long ago. It tasted awful.
<PAGE>
But she forced me to eat it... ever
since then, I've never been able to eat
it again. I'll give this one to my dad.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What's this? I've never seen a vegetable
like this. It's for me?
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. The inn may become
famous for this. What should I cook with
it?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I-It's so big! Amazing, <MYNAME>. It's for
me? I wonder if I can carry it...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>How shall I cook it? I wonder if I can
cut something this big. I know, I'll ask
my dad to help.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't need anything today. Thanks
anyway, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry, <MYNAME>. My arms are full and I
can't carry anymore.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's my birthday today. Huh? You knew?
You're giving me a present?
<PAGE>
Wow, it's a cream puff! I love these.
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's my birthday today. Huh? You knew?
You're giving me a present?
<PAGE>
Wow, thank you. <MYNAME>. You made me so
happy! *giggle*

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's my birthday today. Huh? You knew?
You're giving me a present?
<PAGE>
I wanted this. I wasn't expecting to get
it, though!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's my birthday today. Huh? You knew?
You're giving me a present?
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I accept.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's my birthday today. Huh? You knew?
You're giving me a present?
<PAGE>
This... this is my birthday present? Oh,
I'm not complaining... not really...

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's my birthday today. Huh? You knew?
You're giving me a present?
<PAGE>
Oh! This is my birthday present? You're
kidding, right?
<PAGE>
How can I be happy with something like
this? You're silly, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's my birthday today. Huh? You knew?
You're giving me a present?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Huh? Close my eyes and open my mouth? I
wonder what it is. Aaaah...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>What! Simmered eggplant! Ack, I even
swallowed some of it!
<PAGE>
You know I hate it, don't you? I'm going
to have a hard time forgiving you for
this, <MYNAME>!!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's my birthday today. Huh? You knew?
You have a present for me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>You rarely see something like this. I'll
try cooking it at home. Thank you.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's my birthday today. Huh? You knew?
You have a present for me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>What a shock... What is this? Is it
edible? I'll try cooking it at home.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When this yellow chick is grown, she'll
have white and black feathers, right?
Isn't that so weird?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
She constantly moves her neck. I wonder
if she's looking for something.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This hen is big. Do they usually grow to
this size? Keeping such a monster must
be hard.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This dog... looks like my mom. Around
the eyes are identical!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My stomach gets in the way when I try
to run. Dieting is rough... Oh, I
understand...

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's one big dog. Tough on the one
picking it up, but the dog looks happy
enough!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa... heavy! Don't worry, you don't
have to pick the monster up! You'll
throw your back out!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love to watch cats sunning themselves.
I could watch them forever.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This cat looks like my dad. Especially
around the belly... Oh, don't tell him I
said that!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This cat doesn't need attention from
anyone. I think that's cool.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Cats can put on lots of weight. This is
what they look like without exercise,
then? I think I'll start working out.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Flower day? You're giving me a
flower? Th-Thank you.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're giving me candy? Thank
you, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
Kids luck out during the Pumpkin
Festival. I'm glad I'm still one of
them!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a pretty feather. It's for me?
<PAGE>
Oh, you're just showing it to me?
Shucks.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A ring? What's that for?
<PAGE>
Oh, it's pretty. But I don't want it.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come to our garden sometimes, too. They
love it when you feed them.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm slow on my feet, so I have a hard
time catching them. You're amazing,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Turtles are so slow. Huh? Just like me?
Th-That's not true!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's your birthday, <MYNAME>. Here's a
present. Since you're always helping me.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's your birthday, <MYNAME>. How old are
you? Oh, sorry. I shouldn't ask.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? <MYNAME>? I haven't seen you in a
while.

...mmm... mmm... I'm so... full...
mmm... Thank you... for all the food...

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a nice green bench. I'd like to sit
on it. You think that's allowed?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a nice yellow bench. I'd like to
sit on it. You think that's allowed?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a big barrel! I bet it'd be fun if
I got inside and rolled around.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a scarecrow. It's wearing a
weird hat and weird clothes.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A weather vane always faces the
direction of the wind, right? But why is
it a chicken?
<PAGE>
Can't it be a bird? Or a sparrow? Or...?
<PAGE>
I can't think of anything else.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are some milk cans, but do they
contain fresh milk?
<PAGE>
Oh, they're empty. I wanted to drink
fresh milk, too.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a wagon. I wonder if they're
selling anything?
<PAGE>
Oh, it's just for show. I hoped they
were selling crepes or something.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a nice table. I like unusual
tables. Like eating off them.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A log chair. That's nice. Can I sit on
it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I can't? I figured as much.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You need a beach chair when you go to
the beach. Just right for feeling good
in the sun!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You need a beach parasol table when you
go to the beach. Just right for feeling
good in the sun!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A beacon is lit here. How cool is that?
It's like I'm at camp.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A totem pole. It's cool, but isn't it a
bit small?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a big totem pole. How cool is that.
I want one for my house too.
<PAGE>
The guests would love it. Dad would love
it.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a water fountain. I guess I'm
not allowed to play in the water?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a big water fountain. It's almost
like a swimming pool.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>But I guess I'm not allowed to play in
the water?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A hammock. I've always wanted to try
sleeping in a hammock.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's a toy robot from an old TV show.
<PAGE>
It's a bit dated now, but I still love
it.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They have so many unusual things here.
<PAGE>
But I like it. It's.... interesting.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like parks. There are quite a few
around here. They're pretty, and good
places to play.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bamboo is supposed to bring good luck,
right? My dad said so.
<PAGE>
But I wonder why?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A lion plant. How cool is that?
<PAGE>
Did you grow it, <MYNAME>? You're amazing.
I really admire you.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A mammoth plant. How cool is that?
<PAGE>
Did you make it, <MYNAME>? You're amazing.
I really admire you.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bamboo is supposed to bring good luck,
right? My dad said so.
<PAGE>
But I wonder why?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A cow statue. Did you make it, <MYNAME>?
That's amazing. Can you teach me how to
do that?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A sheep statue. Did you make it, <MYNAME>?
That's amazing. Can you teach me how to
do that?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A chicken statue. Did you make it,
<MYNAME>? That's amazing. Can you teach me
how to do that?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A horse statue. Did you make it, <MYNAME>?
That's amazing. Can you teach me how to
do that?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a tricycle. I want to ride it,
but its got flowers all over it... Oh,
it's just a decoration.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a watering can, but flowers
are growing from in it. Oh, it's a
decoration. That's sorta interesting.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Flowers are blooming in a boot. Hmmm,
could it be a decoration? It's sorta
interesting.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A green fence. I like the color green.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A yellow fence. I like the color yellow.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What an interesting fence. It's like
there are lots of cows.

Now is not the time to be giving
presents.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't have anything to do with hair
salons, but ladies should be happy.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not interested in clothes, so I've
never been to the tailor. What I'm
wearing now is like my inn uniform.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love restaurants. But my dad tells me
not to eat too much.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Does a travel agency take you on trips?
<PAGE>
I'd like to go on a trip once and stay
in another inn.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A tea shop serves lots of delicious
things, right? I don't think I'll be
able to resist!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't like moving house. There's so
many things to move around and the clean
up afterwards is awful.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As the town grows, I'm sure the shops
will too. It would be nice to have more
food shops.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like Western-style towns. It brings
back memories of the town where I used
to live.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Eastern-style motifs seem to be on the
increase. It's subtle and quite nice.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tropical motifs give the town a strange
atmosphere. It feels like I'm in a
faraway land.
